response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value to me, but I am confident it would be an exceptional addition to your collection or business. Given its significance and the unique attributes it possesses, I am offering it to you for $950,000. This price reflects its true worth while allowing us both to benefit from this transaction. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing the details further if you're interested.", "product_price": 950000}
